value.title: Add measures in bulk to your Power BI file without external tools
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to add measures in bulk to Power BI without using external tools. Why you may ask? For example, if you want to calculate the sum of sales between two specific dates, this is the perfect function for you.  You can "hardcode" the

If you want to calculate how many dates go between users changing subscriptions, this DAX measure will help you.  To
